movies.title: American Burger
movies.plot: A bus load of American students, all jocks, cheerleaders and nerds, are on a culture trip in Europe when they stumble upon a mysterious Hamburger stand in the deep European woods, selling 100% American Burgers. A visit to the Burger Factory behind the stand, renders them trapped in this unknown territory, and they are about to realize that European notion of American Hamburgers is terrifyingly different from what they're used to... The road trip descends into a battle for survival as Americans are treated as cows. Who's going to end up in the slaughterhouse? Will the nerds ever get to score with the cheerleaders? Cliques are formed... Strategies are made... And in the midst of it all they learn a thing or two about friendship, survival, consumerism, horny teenage urges and, perhaps most importantly, to never visit a fast-food restaurant ever again. And the nerds somehow end up having the... Best. Summer. Ever.

biography.name: Lena Bengtson

biography.bio: Madeleine Borg is an actress, known for American Burger (2014) and Old Bastard (2018).
biography.name: Madeleine Borg

biography.bio: Benjamin Brook, born May 24th 1990, is a Welsh Actor who resides in London. Benjamin grew up in South Wales where he attended the CYT before moving to London at age 16 to pursue a professional career in Acting at the Arts Educational Schools London. Benjamin was part of the the original London Cast of South Park creators Matt Stone & Trey Parkers record breaking production The Book of Mormon. Benjmain landed his Visa and Management thanks to the help of Scott Rudin who was a big support of his decision to work from Los Angeles. Benjamin splits his time between London and Los Angeles.
biography.name: Benjamin Brook

biography.bio: Pär Camitz is an actor, known for American Burger (2014).
biography.name: Pär Camitz

biography.bio: Malin grew up with parents and twin-sister Jennie in a suburb to Sundsvall, a town in northern Sweden. She liked going to school, trained swimming and karate and dreamed of becoming a veterinarian. In her early 20's she moved to Stockholm but she returned to her hometown after two years. She then went to university with plans to become a teacher but she never got her degree. Malin have had numerous jobs; for a while she did work as a teacher, she has also worked with day care for dogs, in an interior design store, with home care and in a nursing-home for elderly, with psychiatric care in a hospital and in a pet-store. Most days she day dreamed about becoming an actress and in 2006 she finally found the courage she needed to go to her first audition. It was for a short film and surprisingly (to her) she won the part. Sense that day the dream is no longer out of reach, she has gained the courage she need to pursue a career in acting.
biography.name: Malin Dahl
